Verses: 1 abaandamaana Sollai Etruk Kollaayaaga; Kodumaiyulla Saatchikkaaranaayirukka Aagaadhavanode Kalavaayaaga.
2 theemaiseyya Thiralaanapergalaip Pinbatraadhiruppaayaaga; Vazhakkile Niyaayaththaip Puratta Migudhiyaanavargalin Patchaththil Saaindhu, Uththaravu Sollaadhiruppaayaaga.
3 viyaachchiyaththile Thariththiranudaiya Mugaththaip Paaraayaaga.
4 un Saththuruvin Maadaavadhu Avanudaiya Kazhudhaiyaavadhu Thappippogakkandaal, Adhaith Thirumba Avanidaththil Kondupoi Viduvaayaaga.
5 unnaip Pagaikkiravanudaiya Kazhudhai Sumaiyode Vizhundhukidakkak Kandaayaanaal, Adharku Udhaviseyyaadhirukkalaamaa? Avasiyamaai Avanodekooda Adharku Udhaviseyvaayaaga.
6 unnidaththilirukkira Eliyavanudaiya Viyaachchiyaththil Avanudaiya Niyaayaththaip Purattaayaaga.
7 kallakkaariyaththukkuth Dhooramaayiruppaayaaga; Kutramillaadhavanaiyum Needhimaanaiyum Kolaiseyyaayaaga; Naan Dhunmaarkkanai Needhimaan Endru Theerkkamaatten.
8 paridhaanam Vaangaadhiruppaayaaga; Paridhaanam Paarvaiyullavargalaik Kurudaakki, Needhimaangalin Vaarththaigalaip Purattum.
9 anniyanai Odukkaayaaga; Egipthu Dhesaththil Anniyargalaayirundha Neengal Anniyanudaiya Irudhayaththai Arindhirukkireergale.
10 aaruvarusham Nee Un Nilaththil Payirittu, Adhin Palanaich Serththukkol.

11 ezhaam Varushaththil Un Janaththilulla Eliyavargal Pusikkavum, Meedhiyaanadhai Veliyin Jendhukkal Thinnavum, Andha Nilam Summaa Kidakka Vittuviduvaayaaga; Un Thiraatchaththottaththaiyum Un Olivaththoppaiyum Appadiye Seyvaayaaga.
12 aarunaal Un Velaiyaich Seydhu, Ezhaamnaalile Un Maadum Un Kazhudhaiyum Ilaippaaravum, Un Adimaippennin Pillaiyum Anniyanum Ilaippaaravum Oindhiruppaayaaga.
13 naan Ungalukkuch Sonnavaigal Yaavatrilum Saavadhaanamaayirungal. Anniya Dhevargalin Peraich Sollavendaam; Adhu Un Vaayilirundhu Pirakkak Ketkappadavum Vendaam.
14 varushaththil Moondrudharam Enakkup Pandigai Aasarippaayaaga.

15 pulippillaa Appappandigaiyaik Kondaadi, Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Aapip Maadhaththin Kuriththa Kaalaththil Ezhunaal Pulippillaa Appam Pusippaayaaga; Andha Maadhaththil Egipthilirundhu Purappattaaye, En Sannidhiyil Verungaiyaai Varavendaam.

16 nee Vayalil Vidhaiththa Un Payir Velaigalin Mudhalpalanaich Seluththugira Aruppukkaala Pandigaiyaiyum, Varusha Mudivile Nee Vayalil Un Velaigalin Palanaich Serththuth Theerndhapodhu, Serppukkaala Pandigaiyaiyum Aasarippaayaaga.
17 varushaththil Moondrudharam Un Aanmakkal Ellaarum Karththaraagiya Aandavarudaiya Sannidhiyil Varakkadavargal.
18 enakku Idum Baliyin Raththaththaip Puliththamaavudan Seluththavendaam, Enakku Idum Baliyin Kozhuppai Vidiyarkaalamvaraikkum Vaikkavum Vendaam.
19 un Nilaththil Mudhal Vilaichchalgalil Mudhal Kaniyai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuk Kondu Varuvaayaaga; Vellaattukkuttiyai Adhin Thaayin Paalile Samaikkavendaam.
20 vazhiyil Unnaik Kaakkiradharkum, Naan Aayaththampannina Sthaanaththukku Unnaik Kondupoich Serkkiradharkum, Idho, Naan Oru Thoodhanai Unakku Munne Anuppugiren.
21 avar Samugaththil Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu, Avar Vaakkukkuch Sevikodu; Avaraik Kobappaduththaadhe; Ungal Dhurogangalai Avar Poruppadhillai; En Naamam Avar Ullaththil Irukkiradhu.
22 nee Avar Vaakkai Nandraaik Kettu, Naan Solvadhaiyellaam Seyvaayaagil, Naan Un Saththurukkalukkuch Saththuruvaayum, Un Virodhigalukku Virodhiyaayum Iruppen.
23 en Thoodhanaanavar Unakkumun Sendru, Emoriyarum Eththiyarum Perisiyarum Kaanaaniyarum Eviyarum Eboosiyarum Irukkira Idaththukku Unnai Nadaththikkondupovaar; Avargalai Naan Adhampannuven.
24 nee Avargaludaiya Dhevargalaip Panindhukollaamalum, Seviyaamalum, Avargal Seygaigalinbadi Seyyaamalum, Avargalai Nirmoolampanni, Avargaludaiya Silaigalai Udaiththuppoduvaayaaga.
25 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraiye Sevikkakkadaveergal; Avar Un Appaththaiyum Un Thanneeraiyum Aaseervadhippaar. Viyaadhiyai Unnilirundhu Vilakkuven.
26 karppam Vizhukiradhum Malatum Un Dhesaththil Iruppadhillai; Un Aayusunaatkalaip Pooranappaduththuven.
27 enakkup Bayappadum Bayaththai Unakkumun Sellumbadi Seyven. Nee Sellum Idamengumulla Janangal Ellaaraiyam Kalangadiththu, Un Saththurukkal Ellaaraiyum Mudhugu Kaattappannuven.
28 un Mugaththirku Munnindru Eviyaraiyum Kaanaaniyaraiyum Eththiyaraiyum Thuraththivida, Kulavigalai Unakku Munne Anuppuven.
29 dhesam Paazhaaippogaamalum, Kaattumirugangal Unakku Virodhamaaip Perugaamalum Irukkumbadi, Naan Avargalai Ore Varushaththirkulle Un Munnindru Thuraththividaamal,
30 nee Viruththiyadaindhu, Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollumvaraikkum, Avargalaik Konjam Konjamaai Un Munnindru Thuraththividuven.

31 sivandha Samuththiram Thodangi Pelistharin Samuththiramvaraikkum, Vanaandharam Thodangi Nadhivaraikkum Un Ellaiyaayirukkumbadi Seyven; Naan Andhath Dhesaththin Kudigalai Ungal Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen; Nee Avargalai Un Munnindru Thuraththividuvaai.
32 avargalodum Avargal Dhevargalodum Nee Udanbadikkai Pannaadhiruppaayaaga.
33 avargal Unnai Enakku Virodhamaagap Paavanj Seyyappannaadhabadikku Un Dhesaththile Kudiyirukka Vendaam; Nee Avargal Dhevargalaich Seviththaal, Adhu Unakkuk Kanniyaayirukkum Endraar.
